effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
